languages.text: "Перст скорби" переломлен, его многовековое странствие окончено.
The Finger of Sorrow was broken, its centuries-long voyage finished at last.
languages.original_text: "Перст скорби" переломлен, его многовековое странствие окончено.

traits.locale_text: The "Finger of Sorrow" was broken, its centuries-long voyage finished at last.

languages.text: El Dedo del Pesar ha quedado arrasado y su viaje centenario ha llegado finalmente a su conclusión.
languages.original_text: The Finger of Sorrow was broken, its centuries-long voyage finished at last.

traits.locale_text: El Dedo del Pesar ha quedado arrasado y su viaje centenario ha llegado finalmente a su conclusión.

languages.text: 悲しみの指は長年の旅の結果、壊れていた。
languages.original_text: The Finger of Sorrow was broken, its centuries-long voyage finished at last.

traits.locale_text: 悲しみの指は長年の旅の結果、壊れていた。

languages.text: 悲伤之指号被摧毁了，长达几百年的航行最终戛然而止。
languages.original_text: The Finger of Sorrow was broken, its centuries-long voyage finished at last.

traits.locale_text: 悲伤之指号被摧毁了，长达几百年的航行最终戛然而止。

languages.text: Die Finger des Leids wurde zerstört, ihre jahrhundertelange Reise hat endlich ein Ende gefunden.
languages.original_text: The Finger of Sorrow was broken, its centuries-long voyage finished at last.

traits.locale_text: Die Finger des Leids wurde zerstört, ihre jahrhundertelange Reise hat endlich ein Ende gefunden.

languages.text: L'Index du Malheur a été anéanti, et son voyage multiséculaire est enfin arrivé à son terme.
languages.original_text: The Finger of Sorrow was broken, its centuries-long voyage finished at last.

traits.locale_text: L'Index du Malheur a été anéanti, et son voyage multiséculaire est enfin arrivé à son terme.
